content: Thank you for writing this! Mrs. Keller (her sis-in-law told me I was being disrespectful for calling her Sister Candi — that I should call her Mrs. Keller — sigh!). Anyway, you might like to know that Sister…I mean Mrs. Keller attended Middletown Christian Schools and hails from Madison Township. Like Nicole, I have some screenshots of Sister…darn it! ...I mean Mrs. Keller’s conversations as well. :)
